title: narasimhA enai
sahitya:
narasimhA enaik-kaDaikkaNittaruL puri


anupallavi

  tirikaraNamum un tiruvaDi vaitta parama bhaktan tanaip-pAlitta lakSmI


caraNam    tirunAmam kaNam maravAmal manam aruvaghaip-paghaiyiDai uzhalAmal nAn
 dharma nilai shaTrum tavarAmal un dAsar aDi nilai piriyAmal enrum
 iha param tanil oru pughal nI enavE aghamadil koNDu jagam tanil vAzhttiDa
